mapper.sql: apply_id, customer_id, product_id, admin_id, applt_time, approve_time, min_id, interest, per_money
mapper.select:
select ap.*,cu.customer_zname ,cu.customer_id_number,cu.customer_tel from t_apply ap join t_customer cu on ap.customer_id=cu.customer_id
where cu.customer_zname like concat('%',#{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR },'%')
order by applt_time desc
select count(min_id) from t_apply where min_id=#{minId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:

apply_id,
customer_id,
product_id,
admin_id,
applt_time,
approve_time,
min_id,
interest,
per_money,
total_money,
money,

mapper.update:
update t_apply
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
applt_time = #{appltTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
min_id = #{minId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
interest = #{interest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
per_money = #{perMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
action = #{action,jdbcType=REAL},
where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_apply set customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, applt_time = #{appltTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_id = #{minId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, interest = #{interest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, per_money = #{perMoney,jdbcType=REAL} where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
